data.lyric:
[ti:Sheep (Alan Walker Relift)]
[ar:张艺兴/Alan Walker]
[al:Sheep (Alan Walker Relift)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sheep (Alan Walker Relift) - 张艺兴 (LAY)/Alan Walker (艾兰·沃克)
[00:00.58]词：DOM.T/Lay Zhang
[00:01.16]曲：Lay Zhang/Devine Channel/Lim, Kwang Wook /Ryan Kim/DODD
[00:01.74]编曲：Lay Zhang/Devine Channel
[00:02.32]制作人：Alan Walker
[00:02.91]Big thangs sure enough
[00:05.26]There's a monster coming from the forest
[00:08.18]Sheep gang glorious
[00:10.77]Run thru the city with a message for it
[00:13.03]森林里头 be careful bro
[00:15.69]破坏生物链危险 all around
[00:18.80]Attack don't pretend
[00:21.06]You don't know that's how the story goes
[00:24.02]没人在意 now
[00:25.44]羊的脚印 wow
[00:26.84]就像是翻阅日历很快就遗忘掉
[00:29.73]羊的本性 I'll put it on you
[00:32.48]羊的个性 I'll put it on you
[00:34.72]
[00:35.50]You can see my footprints on the concrete
[00:38.24]Everything I pictured all around me
[00:40.85]Gave one final warning
[00:43.80]They callin' for the sheep
[00:45.60]有些桀骜不驯
[00:47.05]有些不可思议
[00:48.33]有了些争议不过只是我耀眼而已
[00:51.07]有些身不由己 不做损人利己
[00:53.71]迈出的步伐一直努力努力再努力
[00:56.33]Big thangs sure enough
[00:58.67]There's a monster coming from the forest
[01:01.54]Sheep gang glorious
[01:04.06]Run thru the city with a message for it
[01:06.77]Big thangs sure enough
[01:09.43]There's a monster coming from the forest
[01:12.08]Sheep gang glorious
[01:14.72]As the hearts burn all the sheep are coming up
[01:35.80]We are glorious
[01:37.16]All the sheep are coming up
[01:39.28]
[01:40.13]咩咩哎呦
[01:41.32]So baby I go
[01:42.50]相信别人自己又被伤害
[01:44.26]咩咩哎呦
[01:45.14]小心翼翼别对世界怀疑
[01:48.00]Just改变不如改变自己
[01:50.16]Oh baby
[01:50.95]有些桀骜不驯
[01:52.29]有些不可思议
[01:53.62]有了些争议不过只是我耀眼而已
[01:56.37]有些身不由己
[01:57.69]不做损人利己
[01:59.00]迈出的步伐自己坚定就会很有力
[02:02.15]You can see my footprints on the concrete
[02:04.84]Everything I pictured all around me
[02:07.41]Gave one final warning
[02:10.45]They callin' for the sheep
[02:30.41]We are glorious
[02:31.80]All the sheep are coming up
